author: alibyte5276
content: Hi all! Longtime ETH fan (I even have a christmas sweater that has ethereum knitted on it), been following this for a while. Got my Prysm Onyx testnet validator up and running :) I'm interested in staking in phase 0. They are looking pretty robust, so I was wondering when the timeframe is looking, still 2020? I guess I'm one of the few who would like to take on the risk because I'm not in this for moon, but for the future of the tech.
